2.0.name: wordpress/b2-xml-sitemap-generator
2.0.description:
Sitemap Generator.

Some features: * Generates XML and HTML sitemaps automatically when changes occur * Set priorities * Set Frequency * Include/Exclude categories from sitemaps * Pings Google/Bing/Ask.com automically about sitemap changes
